DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Telephone counseling trained counselor may enhance well-being quality life patient undergone stem cell transplantation cancer . PURPOSE : Randomized clinical trial compare effectiveness standard follow-up care extend follow-up care treat patient undergone stem cell transplantation cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Standard Follow-up Compared With Extended Follow-up Treating Patients Who Have Undergone Stem Cell Transplantation Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare recovery course patient malignancy undergo standard v extend recovery preparation hematopoietic stem cell transplantation . - Compare efficacy recovery preparation manage rehabilitation need , include reduce stamina cognitive limitation , patient . - Compare ability recovery preparation assist patient caregiver adjust unavoidable fluctuation caregiver role emotion . - Compare ability recovery preparation assist female patient manage menopausal symptom sexual function change . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord gender , type transplantation ( allogeneic vs autologous ) , ethnicity ( Caucasian v non-Caucasian ) , total body irradiation ( yes v ) , participate center . Patients randomize 1 2 supportive care arm . Patients complete 1 baseline assessment prior transplant second assessment transplant , approximately 1 week return home . - Arm I ( Standard Recovery Preparation ) : Patients caregiver receive standard preparation prior discharge , booklet stem cell transplant-related resource contact information , National Cancer Institute-produced publication entitle `` Facing Forward '' . - Arm II ( Recovery Preparation Intervention ) : Patients caregiver receive standard preparation resource material arm I . Women also receive 10 schedule telephone appointment session , last 1 hour , first year return home . Men receive 9 schedule telephone appointment session manner woman . The first 5-6 session specific topic correspond video . The last 4 call booster call answer question , identify new problem , provide support . Patients acute problem problem handle regular session refer interdisciplinary recovery triage team . Problems address team include depression , agitation , cognitive change , fatigue , family disruption , sexuality , gynecologic menopausal difficulty . Patients follow 1 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 412 patient caregiver ( 385 patient randomize ) accrue study within 4 year .
